SELECT sdd.date, IFNULL(a.newCustomerScanNumber,0) as newCustomerScanNumber, IFNULL(a.addCustomerNumber,0) as addCustomerNumber, IFNULL(a.oldCustomerScanNumber,0) as oldCustomerScanNumber, IFNULL(a.lostCustomerNumber,0) as lostCustomerNumber FROM sys_dim_date sdd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count(DISTINCT if(wcc.new_or_old=0,unionid,null)) as newCustomerScanNumber, (SELECT count(DISTINCT wc.external_userid) FROM we_customer wc WHERE wc.unionid=wcc.unionid ) as addCustomerNumber,
count(DISTINCT if(wcc.new_or_old=1,unionid,null)) as oldCustomerScanNumber,
(SELECT count(DISTINCT wc.external_userid) FROM we_customer wc WHERE wc.unionid=wcc.unionid AND to_days(wc.update_time) = to_days(now()) and wc.track_state =5 and wc.state=#{state} ) as lostCustomerNumber, date_format( wcc.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) as create_time FROM we_know_customer_code_count wcc where wcc.know_customer_id=#{knowCustomerId} GROUP BY date_format( wcc.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) )a on a.create_time=sdd.date WHERE date_format(sdd.date,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} ORDER BY sdd.date ASC

SELECT wcc.create_time as date, count(DISTINCT if(wcc.new_or_old=0,unionid,null)) as newCustomerScanNumber, (SELECT count(DISTINCT wc.external_userid) FROM we_customer wc WHERE wc.unionid=wcc.unionid and wc.track_state !=5 and wc.del_flag=0 and wc.state=#{state} ) as addCustomerNumber,
count(DISTINCT if(wcc.new_or_old=1,unionid,null)) as oldCustomerScanNumber,
(SELECT count(DISTINCT wc.external_userid) FROM we_customer wc WHERE wc.unionid=wcc.unionid and wc.track_state =5 AND to_days(wc.update_time) = to_days(now()) and wc.state=#{state} ) as lostCustomerNumber FROM we_know_customer_code_count wcc where wcc.know_customer_id=#{knowCustomerId} GROUP BY date_format(wcc.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY wcc.create_time desc
